proposal1.heroHeadline: Tellwell is burning over 500 hours a year on proposals. Here is exactly where it goes.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, crafting a proposal for story-based design takes hours. With our AI, it's done in 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Each of these problems represents ongoing losses for Tellwell.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Your team spends over 500 hours yearly on writing proposals. That's 500 hours not spent creating stunning video productions.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Inconsistent proposals can weaken your brand message. This inconsistency costs you potential client trust and recognition.

problems.title: Lost Opportunities
problems.description: Every hour spent on proposals is an hour not spent securing new clients. This gap could be costing you up to 10 potential projects annually.

problems.title: Manual Errors
problems.description: Manual proposal writing leads to errors that can cost you deals. Each mistake risks losing a client worth thousands in revenue.

problems.title: Slow Turnaround
problems.description: Taking days to send a proposal means losing the client's interest. This delay could be the difference between winning or losing a project.

problems.title: High Labor Costs
problems.description: Paying skilled creatives to write proposals is expensive. Redirecting this labor could save Tellwell thousands annually.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces all the inefficiencies described above.

solutions.title: Instant Proposals
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours to create. With our system, they are generated in 47 seconds.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Branding inconsistencies weaken your message. Our AI ensures every proposal aligns perfectly with Tellwell's story-based design.

solutions.title: Opportunity Maximizer
solutions.description: Hours lost on proposals are hours lost on opportunities. Our solution frees up your team to focus on closing deals.

solutions.title: Error Reduction
solutions.description: Manual errors can cost deals. Our AI minimizes human error, protecting potential revenues.

solutions.title: Cost Efficiency
solutions.description: Creative labor costs are high for proposal writing. Our system reduces these costs, saving thousands you can reinvest in creative projects.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Tellwell's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Tellwell around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Tellwell.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Revolutionize Acme Corp's Impact Through Storytelling Magic
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Let's craft a dynamic narrative that transforms every interaction into a memorable experience with Tellwell's story-based design.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Every unengaged visitor is a missed opportunity for Acme Corp.

problems.title: Low Brand Engagement
problems.description: Without a captivating story, Acme Corp loses potential connections. This translates to fewer loyal customers.

problems.title: Ineffective Visuals
problems.description: Current visuals fail to capture the essence of Acme Corp. This loss in brand identity weakens market position.

problems.title: Unoptimized Website
problems.description: A confusing user experience causes visitors to leave. This results in significant revenue loss.

problems.title: Lack of Video Content
problems.description: Video content is crucial for engagement. Without it, Acme Corp misses 80% more engagement opportunities.

problems.title: Weak Social Impact
problems.description: An underwhelming social media presence means Acme Corp is losing 60% potential customer interactions.

problems.title: Poor Conversion Rates
problems.description: A lack of strategic design leads to low conversion rates. This loss in potential sales impacts overall growth.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our solutions address these issues head-on, turning losses into growth opportunities.

solutions.title: Video Production
solutions.description: Transform Acme Corp's story into compelling video content. This engages audiences and strengthens brand recall.

solutions.title: Graphic Design
solutions.description: Revitalize visuals to reflect Acme Corp's unique identity. This fortifies brand image and attracts loyal customers.

solutions.title: Web Design
solutions.description: Optimize user experience on Acme Corp's site. This enhances user engagement and boosts conversion rates.

solutions.title: Social Media Strategy
solutions.description: Craft a strategic social media plan to amplify Acme Corp's voice. This increases interactions and brand reach.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: At Tellwell, we make your brand's story unforgettable with creative flair.

whyUsCards.title: Innovative Storytelling
whyUsCards.description: We weave stories that resonate, creating lasting impressions.

whyUsCards.title: Creative Expertise
whyUsCards.description: Our team excels in turning ideas into captivating designs and narratives.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centric Approach
whyUsCards.description: We focus on your needs to deliver tailored solutions that drive results.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Success
whyUsCards.description: Our strategies consistently lead to measurable growth for our clients.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the talented team that makes it all happen.

team.name: Max Kringen
team.bio: Max leads the charge in developing strategy and nurturing client relationships. His passion for storytelling shapes every project.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Strategy
process.description: We dive deep into your brand and lay the groundwork for success.

process.title: Design & Development
process.description: Our creative team gets to work on design and content creation.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: We integrate solutions across platforms for maximum impact.

process.title: Review & Optimize
process.description: We measure success and fine-tune strategies for continued growth.

proposal2.ctaHeadline: Ready to Elevate Acme Corp's Story?
proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's chat about how we can bring your brand's story to life. No strings attached.

lead.company_description:
We help brands + causes connect with their audiences through story-based design and film.

At Tellwell, we believe that story is the most powerful way to introduce a brand, educate and engage your audience, and remind them why they love you. We empower you to share your story with beautiful, story based films and thoughtful branding, and impactful experiential design.
lead.headline: Helping Nonprofits, Higher Ed & Mission-driven Orgs Share Powerful Stories | Founder @ Tellwell | Brand Strategy + Impact Films + Visual Design
